tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Carlton Draught - Beer Chase
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Watch the official Carlton Draught "Beer Chase" TV ad (the full version). To waste even more time visit us at www.facebook.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: 0:59﻿ = best :D
the music just makes it﻿ perfection
Song: John﻿ Farnham - Thunder In Your Heart
Made from Beer﻿
Possibly﻿ the most masculine thing Johnny Farnham's been involved with in decades.
This is better than﻿ most chasing scenes in the movies nowadays
Made from beer?... so it's not﻿ actually beer, it's some synthetic s#it?
The ad may be good but﻿ the beer is still shit.
You stole this song from the movie "RAD"! John Farnhams best....and imposible﻿ to find to buy
officially the greatest ad EVER ﻿
i drink xxxx gold so it pains me to admit this but carlton draught continually﻿ come up with the best beer ads !!!
I liked the part where they were running﻿ away from the cops
if only﻿ the beer was as good as the add
1:16 - no boat there﻿
great adds... shit beer.... ﻿
that guy﻿ @0:44...lol :D awesome ad!
LOL ﻿

For﻿ some reason I feel like drinking Carlton Draught now.
Can't fathom why.
It's amazing to see someone actually﻿ drinking in a beer commercial.
noticed the aquaduct from﻿ grease race scene xd
Carlton draught ads are always awesome, the beer is good to, you gotta check out the slow motion ad they made for draught﻿ if you haven't seen it!
77 people﻿ drink Smirnoff Ice

Reviewer.Music: Genre: Electronic Band: Gorillaz, Blur, The Ting Tingsm, Goodnight electric
